title: Mycobacterium lentiflavum
text:
Mycobacterium lentiflavum
<a href="Etymology">Etymology</a>: Lentus from Latin for slow, flavus, Latin for yellow.
Description.
<a href="Gram-positive">Gram-positive</a>, nonmotile and <a href="acid-fast">acid-fast</a> <a href="coccobacilli">coccobacilli</a>.
Colony characteristics
Physiology
Differential characteristics
Type strain.
Strain 2186/92 = ATCC 51985 = CCUG 42422 = CCUG 42559 = CIP 105465 = DSM 44418 = JCM 13390.
